scholarship.name: Presidential Scholarship
scholarship.note: Academic City's Presidential Scholarship covers full tuition, housing, and meals for top-performing students. Over $400,000 has been invested so far.

name: Catholic Institute of Business and Technology

scholarship.name: Half Scholarship Scheme
scholarship.note: Christian Service University College offers half scholarships for applicants with SSSCE/WASSCE aggregates 6 to 12, covering 50% of tuition fees, renewable with a GPA of 3.60+.

scholarship.name: BILL CHAPMAN’S ACADEMIC AWARDS
scholarship.note: The Bill Chapman Academic Awards offer a full one-year scholarship to the best student (Level 100–300) in each academic department, honoring CSUC's first principal, Bill Chapman.

scholarship.name: SENAVOES’ ACADEMIC AWARD
scholarship.note: The Senavoes’ Academic Award offers a half-year scholarship to the 2nd and 3rd best students (Level 100–300) in each academic department, honoring former CSUC principals Ransford and Juliana Senavoe.
